QuestData.Title: Who Lurks in the Pit
QuestData.Description:
There's a whole lot of necrotic energy coming from this pit. I'm guessing a ritual is being performed down there. And that means a sacrifice.
Do you hear that? I've got the best hearing around, ever since I got this new ear sewn onto me.
It sounds like there are some more of our soldiers trapped down there. Probably all webbed up.
Won'sa and I will... stay up here and help anyone who gets out.
You should jump in and rescue anyone who is left down there!
QuestData.RewardText:
Crenna Earth-Daughter will be vital to our cause. Her connection to nature will help us understand what the ogres have done to this island.
Good work, recruit.

Objectives.Objective: Trapped Expedition Member rescued from cocoons
Defeat Hrun to rescue Crenna Earth-Daughter
